description:
"He is a despicable beast that needs to be taught a lesson." She thought, after seeing the damage he had caused. Little did she know just how despicable this beast could be...a little bit of sexual blackmail will show her.
Source: hanime.tv

titles.title: Huge-breasted and Sadistic Female Teacher: Miria - The Spartan Erotic Torture Clip
